summary: Project to support uploading a master design file (design code, generic name, karigar name), matching uploaded design codes to orders, and enabling filtering of the order list by karigar.
architectural_notes: Introduce a master design mapping dataset (design code -> generic name, karigar name) used to enrich orders and drive karigar-based filtering in the order list.

existing_features.title: Update the master mapping upload/parsing flow so the uploaded file is treated as the fixed “Master Design File” with required columns: Design Code, Generic Name, and Karigar Name. Remove the current flexible/optional rules messaging and align validation + parsing expectations to these three required fields (while still allowing any sheet name).

Ensure orders are matched/enriched using master design file design codes (using the existing canonical design normalization) and expose a Karigar filter control on the Order List page that filters the displayed orders/groups by the selected karigar.

new_feature_requests.summary: Allow uploading a master design file containing design code, generic name, and karigar name (treated as the fixed source of truth) and remove the current related rules/constraints.
Match master design codes to orders and enable filtering the order list page by karigar.

projectName: Support master design file upload (Design Code + Generic Name + Karigar Name) and add karigar filtering on Order List
